nodes.text: Bedlam Institution for the Criminally Demented
The Bedlam Institution for the Criminally Demented was a sanatorium located on the Mid Rim world of Bedlam. It housed Naat Lare for five standard years until his disappearance.
Bedlam is English slang for an insane asylum, or wild chaotic behaviour in general. It allegedly originates from a Cockney pronunciation of Bethlem Royal Hospital in London.
